com.vector.cfg.util.text.log

Interface IUserMessage

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    IExceptionAggregatesCauseChainInUserMessage, IExecutionResult, IScriptTaskType, IScriptTaskType.IApplicationScriptTaskType, IScriptTaskType.IInitScriptTaskType, IScriptTaskType.IProjectScriptTaskType
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    PersistencyRuntimeException, ScriptClientExecutionException, ScriptExecutionException, ScriptingException

    @PublishedApi(value=CHANGES_FORBIDDEN)
public interface IUserMessage
    Classes can implement this interface to provide a message for the user in a user readable manner. E.g. Exceptions could implement the interface to mark, that the Exception is preventable to the user, with a correct user readable text, without a stacktrace content.

    (c) Copyright Vctr Informatik GmbH. All Rights Reserved.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Default Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      default IMixedText getUserMessage()
      Returns a IMixedText which contains a message for the user.
      This message shall not contain internal information or complex problem descriptions.
      It shall be understandable for the customer.

    • Method Detail

      • getUserMessage

        @PublishedMethod
default IMixedText getUserMessage()
        Returns a IMixedText which contains a message for the user.
        This message shall not contain internal information or complex problem descriptions.
        It shall be understandable for the customer.
        Returns:
        User Message
